author: Reuters Editorial
title: Biotest: New Data From Monoclonal Antibody-Drug-Conjugate BT-062
text:
May 3 (Reuters) - Biotest AG:
* DGAP-NEWS: BIOTEST AG: NEW DATA FROM BIOTESTâ€™S MONOCLONAL ANTIBODY-DRUG-CONJUGATE (ADC) BT-062 IN THE THERAPY OF SOLID TUMORS
* GOOD TOLERABILITY AND SIGNS OF EFFICACY IN PHASE I/IIA CLINICAL STUDY
* VERY GOOD EFFECTIVENESS WHEN COMBINED WITH CHEMOTHERAPEUTIC AGENT IN PRECLINICAL STUDIES ON DIFFICULT TO TREAT BREAST CANCER
* BIOTEST IS SEEKING INVESTORS FOR FURTHER DEVELOPMENT OF BT-062 Source text for Eikon: (Gdynia Newsroom)
